attributes.comment:
Please do not allow this increase in Immigrant application fees! I am the new wife
of an Indian National. He comes from Purulia, West Bengal. He could not afford
these application fees without the help of myself and our friends. You must
understand that even at the current fee level you are preventing the "average"
income immigrant from entering the US. My husband is a hard worker and makes
reasonable wages for India, but by our standards, it is almost nothing. I
understand not wanting immigrants arriving that would live off of welfare, but do
you really think it is right to only allow the very wealthy into our country?
I agree it is appalling how slow and backward our current system is, but surely we
can find another way of funding this department other than penalizing the would be
immigrant. I write this while waiting for our application to be processed. He is in
India and I am here. They are telling us it will be close to June before we can see
each other again. I pray that, somehow, it can be processed sooner so we can
begin our new life together.
Most Sincerely,
The new Mrs. Kashyap
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Janice Kashyap
